person.lastname: The Office of the Prime Minister

p.em: Documents and publications from The Office of the Prime Minster

body.p: The Speech from the Throne expresses the main lines of the Government's policy for the coming year.

The Report on the State of the Realm The report covers the Government's policy over the past year, presenting what have been achieved and important proposals that have been launched. (in Norwegian only)
Inaugural Address present the main lines of a new government's policy.
Reports and action plans reports from the Government and The Soria Moria Declaration

Draft resolutions, bills and white papers - are documents that the Government presents to the Storting. They are drawn up by the ministries, and are discussed by the King in Council, before being sent to the Storting.
Educating Girls – What the World Can and Must Do
Open letter to the world leaders from Helle Thorning-Schmidt, Erna Solberg, Julia Gillard, José Manuel Barroso and Andris Piebalgs.
for a government formed by the Conservative Party and the Progress Party.
